channel.title: Help me fix this
channel.description: Then i restart server on Vps its roll back player stats and items..... help me to fix it

item.title: Help me fix this
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

usman555:

90% of your posts are help. Do most stuff on your own, cuz you will be going up to people saying I coded my own server. When it’s all of us who did every piece of crap you have on your server.

Who honestly cares, a lot of your posts are help to.

OP:
::bootball or ::kickall.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this
item.dc:creator: @Dubstep Dubstep
item.description:
@Dubstep wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:6, topic:357216"]I’ve just checked through ALL of your threads, and guess what?
They’re always asking MoparScape "Poster’s/veterans " to help you code something, and the other thing is… That it’s about 3 quarters of a server being posted. If we posted and help you on those topics, you’d have a fully functional server. Which you didn’t code, you just copied and pasted somebody’s work that they posted for you.

Spoon Feeder, right here.[/quote]
very offtopic. anyways its hard to understand your esl grammar.

“if server brokes and i cant login how do i kick all players?
i have restart…”
translation: if the server is non functional, and i cannot login, then how do i kick all of the players?
i have a restart?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this

item.description:

item.title: Help me fix this
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Kick all players, then restart. Don’t just restart, or a rollback will happen.

Read full topic

item.description:

make sure players log out befor u restart or have an auto kick then resart so it saves there profiles
